name: Ultimate Housewife
description:
Inspired by the E3 article (and Twitter thread) about games for girls, I present the ultimate game for girls!*

Forget Sudoku and Solitaire. This is the only game that girls should be playing!

(You don't actually have to play. Just watch a play-through of the entire game here: )

This game is released under a Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial license. Please feel free to add or modify it as desired -- the game is not archived and should be able to be imported easily into RenPy.

* E3 has deleted their tweet, but here are some choice snippets:

https://twitter.com/NintendoFanGirl/status/1295778873087590400

https://twitter.com/moriyoshijon/status/1295795303107325953

And the original article: https://web.archive.org/web/20200818173829/https://parade.com/1065301/nicolepajer/online-games-for-women/
